text: Alexsandro de Souza (born 14 September 1977) is a Brazilian football player. He plays for Coritiba. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competitionAlex's Statistics Alex10.com.br Retrieved 10 February 2007.
